attributes.action: act on the results of these petitions instead of just delivering glib responses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These petitions represent the views and aspirations of the voting public , especially those views that don't get picked up by the party political system.

People support these petitions because they want things to happen , I have lost count of how many times I have signed a petition on this site only to receive a glib response that i cannot even leave a comment on.

I therefore call on the prime minister to make a commitment to acting on petitions if they reach a certain threshold or to at least allow open
commenting on the response, otherwise this is little more than posturing and wasting of our time.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
